titles.title: Raising a question of the privileges of the House pursuant to article I, section 7, of the United States Constitution.
Raising a question of the privileges of the House pursuant to article I, section 7, of the United States Constitution.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Recommits to the committee of conference H.R. 5515 (John S. McCain National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2019) because, in the opinion of the House of Representatives, the conference report contravenes the clause of the Constitution requiring bills raising revenue to originate in the House and is an infringement of the privileges of the House.
